Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. I believe it's worth more than its face value due to its unique features and quality. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $200. This offer includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide on how to best utilize its capabilities. I trust you'll find its value exceeds the investment. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
